pkgmetadata.longdescription: Phylogenetic Assembly with Soft Taxonomic Inferences // A pre- processor for mrBayes that assimilates sequences, taxonomic information and tree constraints as per xxx. The main functions of interest for most users will be pastis_simple, pastis_main and conch. The main analysis is conducted with pastis_simple or pastis_main followed by a manual execution of mrBayes (3.2). The placement of taxa not contained in the tree constraint can be investigated using conch.
